hashtags.description: Issues always become magnified during huge events like the Olympic games, and this past year brought to light injustices against the LGBTQ community in Russia. I wanted to take a retrospective look at this topic that I think should have received more attention.

I come from a family of frequent flyers, and the missing flight MH370 was a tragedy that was greatly felt. The child-like nature of the imperfectly carved stamps and simple color palette represent the innocent lives that were on board, family members and loved ones lost. May they rest in peace.

Talaash is a city treasure hunt in which teams will run for the treasure at different spots in Trivandrum city. There will be preliminary test from which these 6 teams will be selected for finals.

Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still.Can you capture that instant?

artist.title: 1) It is an open event, you can register till 3 pm. 2) You can use only a camera having 10 megapixels or more.3) Maximum of 5 entries per person.4) Editing is not allowed

hashtags.description: Weave a story. Question your creativity. Your language is your power.

Are you a Creative artist? Do you get wowed while seeing amazing graphics or stunning shots in films? Then this is something which will blow your mind.The Visual Effects and interactive session in Cult A Way organised by SCTCE FILM CLUB with MOXIE FX, the youngest Visual Effects firm in Trivandrum,provide CG and compositing services for feature film and commercials with a mission of â€˜An Ultimate Solution for Creative Ideas by Integrating Art and Technology

Every four years, we gather around televisions across the globe to witness history - The World Cup. It's a time when everyone comes together to celebrate and enjoy the sport of football. Foosball is a fast and fun tabletop game based on football, so I decided to combine Foosball with the World Cup to represent the unity it brings between countries and the enjoyment we all get from watching it.

artist.name: Literary
artist.title: Speak your heart out with no repetition and hesitation. Give your presence of mind and the words you hold a jolt with this challenge.

hashtags.description: Get up! Dress up! Show up!If you have what it takes to walk the walk.

Genie from Aladdin was by far my favorite character acted by Robin Williams, inspiring this piece. With his humorous wisdom, reflected in the many characters he played, he provided the world with uplifting optimism. Thank you, Robin Williams.
Born and raised watching him play. YEAH JEETS!

hashtags.description:
This represents the familiar sequence we see of models on runway, and the intention to reach a desired level of perfection. Identity becomes lost, as their main objective is to ideally represent the garment they are carrying.
Original photo from Tibi's Pre SS2015 RTW collection.

Photography/ Photo Manipulation. Inspired by the #blacklivesmatter movement, founded in 2012, this piece features the digital manipulation of signs. I think it is important for black youth to know their worth before the media and the world tries to convince them otherwise.

We have seen a system that has continued to fail black men this year; where selling loose cigarettes is punishable by death, and justice is in the eye of the beholder. These words 'I Can't Breathe' shall echo through United States history as a cry from a people that have yet to know what it means to be free and truly equal.
